data.name: Pawnbarian - Support the Developers & Gold Heroes
data.detailed_description:
This is a purely cosmetic DLC. It doesn't contain the actual characters, everything's in the base game.

Features

  • Blings out all your heroes in gold
  • Our eternal gratitude
  • Improves chances of more free content being made in the future

Not Features

  • Anything tangible that's actually "worth it" for the price

data.short_description: Support the Developers is a tiny, purely cosmetic DLC.
